name: Indiana Blu
description:
Blu comes from a family of explorers with a special ability to rewind their own time. When he was young, he was told tales of his famed ancestor Cyan, that ventured into the depths of the notoriously dangerous castle known as Xie Huo Jing Ling (邪火精灵). He left behind his hat, and passed down this message, “Whoever is able to attain my hat shall be bestowed the title, Indiana”. Generations passed, with each descendant failing to do so. It is now up to Blu to prove that he has what is takes and make his family proud.

You play as a bird called Blu. Blu wants the prized hat of the legendary Indiana Cyan (who is your esteemed ancestor) that’s hidden in a castle filled with enemies and obstacles. The player has to help the bird achieve his lifelong goal of becoming the best explorer in his family. 

Get Blu safely through the castle and reach the fabled Indiana Hat, and earn the title to become, Indiana Blu.

Game completed by me and my groupmates for our game design module. We put in a lot of effort for this project, so a little donation goes a really long way :) We hope you enjoy the game!

**To play the game, extract all the files into an empty folder and run the executable.**
